short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension for sharing your online surfing with your friends

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reddit without the website.
Browser-native Pinterest.
A completely different way to share the sites you love.

Poster is a social network that sits on top of the web as a browser extension, allowing you to share sites with your followers in a single click. Your home feed stays up-to-date with pages your friends and family are interested in, and when you stumble on a link that a followee has liked, we send you an unobtrusive notification letting you know. We never spam your email, blast you with ads or track your browsing activity. Itâ€™s completely free to use. The days of copying and pasting URLs into messaging applications are over. Poster is here.

Poster is a product of Loomis Technologies, Inc., a St. Louis, Missouri based development studio. If you have feature requests and/or bug alerts, send a note to hello@loomistechnologies.com. We are actively working on Poster and would love to get your feedback.
